text: "Unforgivable Sinner" is a 1998 debut single by Norwegian singer Lene Marlin and is the leading single from her debut studio album Playing My Game. It went to number 1 in Norway, number 2 in Italy, number 13 in the United Kingdom, number 15 in Scotland, number 48 in Australia, number 32 in New Zealand and number 37 in France. Three different music videos were made for the song. ==Track listings== ==References== Category:1998 songs Category:Debut singles
title: Unforgivable Sinner
